Factional kill (Basic attack)
Factional chat
Only starts with 2 members at most: a Yakuza Boss and Yakuza Killing. The Yakuza Boss must spawn.
At the beginning of the game, there are two extra townies who have roles that can visit each night. These two players are secretly Yakuza Recruits. The Yakuza Recruits don't know who the other Yakuza members are, but the Yakuza members know who the Recruits are. Investigatives see the Yakuza Recruits as suspicious, and their role appears to be a random Yakuza role.
When a Yakuza Recruit visits a Yakuza member, the Recruit gets to choose any Yakuza Support role to convert into.
Yakuza Supports can skip their night to convert into a Yakuza Boss or Yakuza Killing, if there are no members of those subalignments.
Yakuza Recruits cannot win with town.
